title: The Shedding Tool Guide
author: Name
cleaned_text: Have you heard...rumors...about the "new dance?" Learn the truth about those rumors according to the actual science, and what you can do to keep your family healthy and safe. **Please help by sharing...publishing information like this may get us kicked off social media! We need our community to get the word out.** Description Much ado has been made about the "shedding" of a new, special "dance" these days.... Is it true? Can it happen? And if it is...what can you do to keep your family healthy and safe? We dive into the actual research (all sources cited) to look at real risks, real effects, real experiences. Then, we walk you through herbs that may be able to help, what the research shows they can do, and how to use them. If protecting your family's health and supporting their immune systems in a world of uncertainty matters to you, you'll want to grab this guide. **PLEASE SHARE!!** This will be *heavily* censored across social media and may even get us kicked off for good. We need our community's help to get the word out!
